description:
This plugin has been recently acquired by Zeroqode - please bear with us while we review the code and make improvements/fixes where necessary.
 
A straightforward simple chart that allows you to format a list to a chart with dynamic scale. No need to have over complex column logic to set rows, their name and color.

Chart are made to sum all the rows and display by column.

This plugin lets you add numbers and make a bar chart on that.

NEED HELP BUILDING A CUSTOM APPLICATION?
https://dev.zeroqode.com

SUPERCHARGE YOUR APP WITH ZEROQODE PLUGINS
https://zeroqode.com/plugins

QUESTIONS OR NEED HELP?
https://forum.zeroqode.com
name: Custom Bar Chart for Row
plugin_instructions:
1. Install Plugin on your app.
2. Set the location and size of the chart
3. Add the list for data, tags and color of bar charts
